item.title: Py simple crawler
item.description: python简易爬虫抓取高校硕士招生信息 _init_初始化函数 get_html获取网页信息 get_info寻找有用信息 write_info写入成csv文件 import httpx from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import pprint import json class Base: def __init__(self, name, url) -> None: self.name = name self.url = url self.html = " " self.info_list = [] def get_html(self): try: f = open(self.name + ".html", "r", encoding="utf-8") self.html = f.read() f.close() except Exception as e: r = httpx.get(self.url) f = open(self.name + ".html", "w", encoding="utf-8") f.write(r.text) f.close self.html = r.text def get_info(self): pass def write_info(self): with open(self.
